name: nobeltsvanillagame
title: No Belts Vanilla Game
author: DellAquila
description: Have a new experience with NO BELTS. You can make from the start the Small Logistic Robot, the Small Logistic Chests and the Small Roboport.The Science Pack 2 now requires small-logistic-robot instead of belt, but consumes the same resources. In Settings you can allow or not the belts.
